RevitRubyShell.DefaultScript:
# Welcome to Ruby Shell! # Try the following; it will print to the output # window below the code:
require 'RevitAPI' include Autodesk::Revit include Autodesk::Revit::Elements _app.active_document.elements(Room.to_clr_type, arr = ElementArray.new) arr.each do |room| puts room.name end
